short_description: lotus client management & public relations is a public relations agency based in lahore, pakistan.
long_description: lotus is south asia's premier professional strategic communications agency, founded in 2007. we offer expertise in all areas of internal and public facing communications including; individual and corporate brand building, reputation management, brand to consumer media relations, event publicity, influencer engagement, ai driven comms, networking, damage limitation, crisis communications, communications training, property and platform creation, stakeholder management, employee communication and personal pr.
